title: 2024 Jawa 42 launched, costs less than older model. Check price and specification
description: Jawa Motorcycles introduced the 2024 Jawa 42 in India with prices ranging from Rs 1.73 lakh to Rs 1.98 lakh. The updated bike, priced lower than the previous model, includes new visual changes, a 294 cc engine, gear-based engine mapping, improved suspension, and revised seating for enhanced performance and comfort.
